column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Fresh Fruit Tart- I am a fruit tart man. Deep down
column2: I can not resist fruit tarts for some odd reason. Genetically
column3: it was impossible not to get this. A divine cookie bowl
column4: half blueberry/strawberry topped with raspberries down the divide sitting on a berry mixture to seal them down. I couldn't handle myself. One bite into this gave me the biggest grin in the world. This is the berry-splosion your body has been waiting for. The sweetness may overcome those of you who aren't prepared
column5: possibly put you into shock. But my penchant for devouring sour patch kids and berries from our yard as a child has galzanized my stomach for this very moment.
